description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if an official curfew is officially announced in any part of the cities of Minneapolis, Minnesota or Saint Paul, Minnesota between market creation and January 12, 2026, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Any curfew which is officially announced will qualify regardless of if/when it goes into effect.  

To qualify, the curfew must be officially declared by the City of Minneapolis, the City of St. Paul, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, or a relevant state or federal authority, and must apply to any segment of the population or geographic area within Minneapolis or St. Paul. The curfew may be citywide, countywide, or limited to specific neighborhoods or regions. Temporary curfews (e.g. from 10 PM to 6 AM) will qualify.

Unofficial guidance, voluntary advisories, or curfews outside the specified date range will not qualify.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official government announcements; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

markets.question: Curfew in Minneapolis-Saint Paul by Monday?

title: Curfew in Minneapolis-Saint Paul by Monday?
